Header: Troops Entertain Civilians Screening Tamil Film
Content: Brigadier A.S Hewawitharana, General Officer Commanding, 57 Division under the supervision of the Commander 574 Brigade and 3 Gajaba Regiment made arrangements to entertained civilians at Olumadu area on Friday (7) by screening the Tamil movie, 'Vishwasam'. It was flashed on a LED panel put up by the Army. Over 100 civilians watched it and they were offered refreshments while watching the film.
